results.abstract: Article detailing difficult struggle faced by stutterers who find talking 'plain hard work'; Mrs John Glen, Edward Hoagland, Homer Bigart and John Hammond recall their efforts to cure problem; Mrs Glenn's experiences at Hollins Communications Research Institute, Roanoke, Va, described; illus (M)

headline.main: The Struggles of Stutterers: 'Talking Is Plain Hard Work'; Immersion Course War Correspondent

results.snippet: WASHINGTON--To Annie Glenn, wife of Senator John Glenn of Ohio, the first American to orbit the earth, the microphone and the telephone were "instruments of the devil." She was deathly afraid of them.

byline.original: By NAN ROBERTSON Special to The New York Times

results.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON--To Annie Glenn, wife of Senator John Glenn of Ohio, the first American to orbit the earth, the microphone and the telephone were "instruments of the devil." She was deathly afraid of them.

results.abstract: Soviet leader Leonid Brezhnev says 1st Indian astronaut will soon join Soviet cosmonauts in space (S)

headline.main: India's First Astronaut Will Join Russian Group on a Space Flight

results.snippet: MOSCOW, Feb. 22 (UPI) The world's first Indian astronaut will join Soviet astronauts in a space flight soon, Leonid I. Brezhnev said today.
results.lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Feb. 22 (UPI) The world's first Indian astronaut will join Soviet astronauts in a space flight soon, Leonid I. Brezhnev said today.
